definition: inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那靈感是來自保險絲盒與監獄的雜交麼。

sentences.english: Inspired by the picture of a valkyrie I found on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 從網路上找到的北歐戰神使女的圖片得到的靈感。

sentences.english: My husband Clay Lohmann is the greatest inspiration in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫粘土羅曼是我一生中最大的靈感。

sentences.english: Slip away to innocent days with this fantastically fun collection of jigsaws with a nostalgic theme.
sentences.chinese: 溜掉無辜天這個親密樂趣收集靈感與懷舊主題。

sentences.english: The bright moon provides inspiration for my poem again.
sentences.chinese: 這麼好看的明月，又給了我作詩的靈感。

sentences.english: Inspiration from contemporary, rhythmic and vibrant dances.
sentences.chinese: 靈感來自於現代，藝術和佈滿活氣的跳舞。

sentences.english: Writing is sort of making vintage wine, in which the spirit and mind become more and more abundant and deeper over time.
sentences.chinese: 寫作如同釀製陳年老窖，時間越長靈感越多越深邃。

sentences.english: Inspiration might come from someplace you never imagined.
sentences.chinese: 靈感可能從任何你想也想不到的地方噴薄而發。

sentences.english: TPC:It allows the spellcaster to telepathically contact someone that they know personally.
sentences.chinese: 它允許施法者通過心靈感應聯接一個他本人認識的人。

sentences.english: Instead seek inspiration from those before you and the world around you.
sentences.chinese: 用前人的創造和你身邊的東西取代苦苦探尋靈感。

sentences.english: Sometimes the best ideas come to us when we're not focused on finding the best ideas.
sentences.chinese: 有時候一些金點子都是在我們不經意間突發靈感的。

sentences.english: Inspiration is necessary to inculcate the sense of unity, and to create economic ideals.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸同心協力的認識，創造經濟理想也是需要靈感的。

sentences.english: Here is a number of breathtaking photographs to inspire you!
sentences.chinese: 下面就是一些懾人心魄的照片，能讓你靈感有如泉湧。

sentences.english: I get a lot of my ideas and inspiration from popular culture.
sentences.chinese: 我從大衆文化中收穫了不少理念和靈感。

sentences.english: The inspiration originates from the Apple experience centers which are popular all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 這個靈感來自於風靡全球的蘋果體驗店。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
